This is a site used to host analysis of German crime statistics in relation to immigration using available data as of June 2024.

All demography data is taken from the [Federal Statistics Office of Germany](https://www.destatis.de/EN/Home/_node.html) (*Statistisches Bundesamt* or *Destatis*).

All crime statistics come from the [Federal Criminal Police Office of Germany](https://www.bka.de/EN/Home/home_node.html) (*Bundeskriminalamt* or *BKA*).
